text:
@GregAbbott_TX Former GOP strategist Steve
Schmidt, who quit the GOP in 2018, says it has become “fully the party of Trump,” warned that “no amount of gaslighting, delusion, fantasy happy talk” from the president would change the fact it will take years to recover from the pandemic.#COVID19
